traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength, Constitution, and Charisma scores each increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Tritons reach maturity around age 15 and can live up to 200 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Tritons tend toward lawful good. As guardians of the darkest reaches of the sea, their culture pushes them toward order and benevolence.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Tritons are slightly shorter than humans, averaging about 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Control Air and Water
traits.description: A child of the sea, you can call on the magic of elemental air and water. You can cast fog cloud with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast gust of wind with it, and starting at 5th level, you can also cast wall of water with it (see the spell in the sidebar). Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Emissary of the Sea
traits.description: Aquatic beasts have an extraordinary affinity with your people. You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

traits.name: Guardians of the Depths
traits.description: Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, you have resistance to cold damage, and you ignore any of the drawbacks caused by a deep, underwater environment.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial.
